name: Superfood Blueberry Muffins
author: mls89
summary: These delicious and wonderfully-textured muffins are packed with healthy ingredients: whole wheat flour, oats, antioxidant-rich blueberries, walnuts, and Greek yogurt. These will have a more dense consistency and a wonderful texture. Before baking you can sprinkle the tops with a few oats, cinnamon, white sugar, or walnuts as you desire.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons skim milk, or as needed  (Optional)
1 cup blueberries, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners
Combine flour, oats, brown sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl; stir in applesauce, yogurt, 1/4 cup skim milk, vegetable oil, and egg
If the dough us a bit too dry, add extra milk 1 tablespoon at a time
Batter should be about the consistency of a thick oatmeal
Fold blueberries and walnuts into the batter
Spoon into prepared muffin cups until almost full
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 15 to 20 minutes
